original: Ekstein, Nils Gunnar, civilingenjör, Göteborg, f. 13/8/03 i Torshälla av fabr. J. S. E. o. Maria Sjöberg. G. 42 m. Gertrud Lundqvist. Barn: Hans f. 44, Lars 47. — Stud. v. maskinfacksk. i Eskilstuna 24, v. KTH (maskin-byggn.) 25-29. Stud:res. o. prakt, i Tyskli. 30, Engl. 36. Anst. å beräkn:-o. offertavd. h. STAL i Finspång 29- 34, å ångtekn. avd. v. S. Sv:eis ång-pannefören. i Malmö 34-35, lär. v. ma-■skinfacksk. i Es.kiktuna 35-37, verkst :-chef h. A-B Davy Robertsons Maskin-fabr. i Gbg sed. 37.
translated: Ekstein, Nils Gunnar, engineer, Gothenburg, b. August 13th, 1903 in Torshälla to factory worker J.S.E. and Maria Sjöberg. Married in 1942 to Gertrud Lundqvist. Children: Hans b. 1944, Lars b. 1947. Studied mechanical engineering at Eskilstuna Technical School in 1924 and at the Royal Institute of Technology (mechanical engineering) from 1925-1929. Studied and worked in Germany in 1930 and England in 1936. Employed in the estimation and quotation department at STAL in Finspång from 1929-1934, in the steam technology department of the Swedish Steam Boiler Association in Malmö from 1934-1935, taught at the mechanical engineering school in Eskilstuna from 1935-1937, and was the managing director of A-B Davy Robertsons Machine Factory in Gothenburg since 1937.
